DataElement.preferredName: G-8 Screening Tool A Decline of Food Intake over Past 3 Months Score 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score that represents a person's decline in food intake over the past 3 months due to loss of appetite, digestive problems, chewing or swallowing difficulties using a 3-point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: G-8 Screening Tool Decline of Food Intake over Past 3 Months Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tool for the assessment of geriatric cancer patients. It combines 7 questions from the mini nutritional assessment (MNA) with one question regarding subject age. Items selected from MNA concern nutritional status, weight loss, body mass index, motor skills, psychological status, number of medications, and self-perception of health._A question about whether an individual had a decline in food intake over the past 3 months due to loss of appetite, digestive problems, chewing, or swallowing difficulties._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tool for the assessment of geriatric cancer patients. It combines 7 questions from the mini nutritional assessment (MNA) with one question regarding subject age. Items selected from MNA concern nutritional status, weight loss, body mass index, motor skills, psychological status, number of medications, and self-perception of health.

Items selected from MNA concern nutritional status, weight loss, body mass index, motor skills, psychological status, number of medications, and self-perception of health.

ValueDomain.preferredName: G-8 Food Intake Decline 3 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating than an individual has or had no decrease in their food intake.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating than an individual has or had no decrease in their food intake.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating than an individual has or had a moderate decrease in their food intake.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating than an individual has or had a moderate decrease in their food intake.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating than an individual has or had a severe decrease in their food intake.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating than an individual has or had a severe decrease in their food intake.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has food intake declined over
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has food intake declined over the past 3 months due to loss of appetite, digestive problems, chewing or swallowing difficulties?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.origin: G-8:Geriatric 8 Screening Tool, C.A. Bellera, et al. Annals of Oncology 23: 2166-2172, 2012
